parameters.name: ActionType
parameters.description:
The type of the handling action. Valid values:

*   doPlaybook: runs a playbook.
*   changeEventStatus: changes the status of an event.
*   changeThreatLevel: changes the risk level of an event.

parameters.name: AutoResponseType
parameters.description:
The type of the automated response rule. Valid values:

*   event
*   alert

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: The page number. Pages start from page 1.

parameters.name: Id
parameters.description: The ID of the automated response rule.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries per page. Maximum value: 100.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description:
The region in which the data management center of the threat analysis feature resides. Specify this parameter based on the regions in which your assets reside. Valid values:

*   cn-hangzhou: Your assets reside in regions in China.
*   ap-southeast-1: Your assets reside in regions outside China.

parameters.name: RoleFor
parameters.description: The ID of the account that you switch from the management account.

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The type of the view. Valid values:
- 0: the current Alibaba Cloud account
- 1: the global account

parameters.name: RuleName
parameters.description: The name of the automated response rule.

parameters.name: Status
parameters.description:
The status of the rule. Valid values:

*   0: disabled
*   100: enabled

parameters.name: SubUserId
parameters.description: The ID of the user who created the rule.
